basics.name: Jonathan Fox
basics.label: Game Developer
basics.description: An innovative game developer with experience building 2D and 3D games on multiple platforms. Proficient in C# and JavaScript. Comfortable with modern engines like Unity and Godot. Passionate about making games that players love.

work.summary:
Outspoke.io is a supply management platform that helps
business owners manage their businesses efficiently.
highlights: Maintained website by developing new components using JavaScript, React, Material-UI, and Feathers.js.

Collaborated with members from other teams, including
UX designers, management, and back end engineers.

projects.name: HSLookup.net
projects.summary:
A Web Application to improve Hearthstone players'
understanding of the game by showing valuable statistics.
highlights: Used React to create a web app that gives users access to filter options and displays card data.
Created a server on Heroku that enables the client to use up-to-date card data from the official Blizzard API.

projects.name: Fidgeter Widget
projects.summary: A mobile game that mimics a fidget toy on your phone with sounds and haptic feedback.
highlights: Programmed core game elements, including touch logic, UI, and handling local user data.
Used HTTP requests to implement user login and a global high score system on an AWS AppSync server.

projects.name: Stick Fighter
projects.summary: A 2D online multiplayer fighting game that can be played in your browser.
highlights: Implemented multiplayer with an authoritative server and clients using Socket.IO.
Built the game engine from scratch, including hitbox detection and character animations.
